title.rendered: STEDI 4 PACK T5 2721 WEDGE 1 SMD LED LIGHT

content.rendered:
STEDI T5 Wedge LED Light Conversion Globe CANBUS Compatible, found in dash lights, licence plates & interior lighting.

DETAILS

KEY TECHNICAL FEATURES | T5

  • CANBUS friendly – Error free operation
  • Not Polarity Sensitive – our T5’s wont fail if you plug them in the wrong way.
  • Constant Current circuit – Avoids compromising LED life & provides consistent illumination across all LEDs
  • Compatible from 9v to 12v circuits.
  • 1SMD LED for uniform light distribution

COMMON USES FOR T5 GLOBES

  • Gauge Dashboard
  • Licence Plate
  • Instrument Panel
  • Interior Lighting

Sold in packs of 4

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL Aluminium
LED 3030
LUMINOUS FLUX 17 Lumens
POWER 0.035A @ 13.6v
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE DC 12v ONLY
LIFESPAN 30,000 Hours
CANBUS Compatible
CONNECTOR TYPE T5
INGRESS PROTECTION IP65
OPERATING TEMP -40°c to + 80°c
CERTIFICATION CE, ROHS
COLOUR RENDERING INDEX 71 CRI

 

 

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 4 x STEDI T5 2721 Wedge LED Lights
  • User Instruction Manual

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
